info.description: Complete SubStater API with automatic token management
info.title: SubStater API

get.description: Get all categories in the system (admin only)
Get specific category details (admin only)

post.description: Upload category icon image file (admin only)

get.description: Get all countries in the system (admin only)
Get specific country details (admin only)
Get all currencies in the system (admin only)
Get specific currency details (admin only)

Get all contact form submissions (Admin only)

**Features:**
- Pagination support
- Filter by read/unread status
- Search by email
- Sorted by newest first

delete.description:
Delete a contact form (Admin only)

**Note:** This is a soft delete - data is preserved with deleted_at timestamp

get.description:
Get specific form details (Admin only)

**Note:** Automatically marks the form as read when viewed

patch.description:
Mark form as read or unread (Admin only)

Set isRead to:
- true: Mark as read
- false: Mark as unread

post.description:
Block a user from submitting forms (Admin only)

**Options:**
- Block by email
- Block by IP address
- Block by both

**Note:** At least one (email or IP) must be provided

delete.description:
Unblock a user (Admin only)

Use the block ID from the blocked users list

get.description:
Get all blocked users list (Admin only)

**Includes:**
- Email and IP address
- Block reason
- Who blocked the user
- When they were blocked

Get contact form statistics dashboard (Admin only)

**Includes:**
- Total forms count
- Unread forms count
- Recent forms (last 7 days)
- Blocked users count
Get all admin logs with pagination (admin only)
Get logs for specific admin user (admin only)
Get admin log statistics and recent activities (admin only)
Get all subscription plans in the system (admin only)
Get specific plan details (admin only)
Get all price records in the system (admin only)

delete.description: Delete price record from system (admin only)

get.description: Get specific price record (admin only)
Get all subscriptions in the system (admin only)
Get specific subscription details (admin only)
Get all users in the system (admin only)
Get specific user details (admin only)
Get most popular custom subscriptions (admin only)
Get complete analytics dashboard with all statistics (admin only)
Get dashboard overview statistics (admin only)
Get most popular subscription plans (admin only)
Get most popular preset subscriptions (admin only)
Get revenue breakdown by category (admin only)
Get user segmentation by billing cycle, currency, and region (admin only)
Get profile - Token auto-used (Collection Auth)

post.description: Register a new user - Token auto-saved

get.description: Filter subscriptions by category (1=Streaming, 2=Music, etc.)
Get subscription details with plans and prices (filtered by user's region)
Get all plans for a subscription (Basic, Standard, Premium)
Get all subscription categories (Streaming, Music, AI, etc.)
Get single category details

message.example: I would like to know more about the premium features and how they can help me manage my subscriptions better.

post.description:
Submit a contact form (Public endpoint - No auth required)

**Features:**
- Spam protection with rate limiting (3 submissions/hour)
- Automatic blocking check
- IP and user agent tracking

**Validation:**
- Username: 2-100 chars
- Email: Valid email format
- Subject: 5-200 chars
- Message: 10-5000 chars

get.description: Get all my active subscriptions

put.description: Update subscription details (price, billing date, status)

get.description:
Get comprehensive subscription statistics including:
- Total lifetime spending
- Most expensive subscription
- Per-subscription spending details
- 6-month spending trends
- Projected annual costs
- Currency breakdowns
